description.ko: 부드러운 빛으로 맥동하며 흐르는 유기적인 형태의 매혹적인 디스플레이로, AURA-7의 자연스러운 조화와 끊임없는 에너지 전이를 표현합니다.
description.en: A mesmerizing display of fluid, organic shapes that pulse with soft luminescence, representing the natural harmony and seamless energy transitions of AURA-7.

prompt: Cinematic shot of AURA-7, organic flowing energy ribbons, liquid silk texture, soft glowing bioluminescence, iridescent pastel colors, smooth transitions, macro photography, high resolution, 8k, surreal atmosphere, dreamlike movement
